strong.span: Click on teachers name for weekly assignments

span.style: font-size: 18pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(181, 39, 26);

em.span: The Murtaugh School District is a progressive rural district serving approximately 400 students in grades PreK–12. The District boasts excellent facilities, instructional staff and the best technology. Murtaugh is a 2018 Title I Distinguished School recipient, recognized for closing the achievement gap and making aggressive gains in student achievement.

Murtaugh offers preschool to all four year olds, full time kindergarten, one to one devices, aquaculture, health occupation, dual credits among many other student opportunities. We strive to give students in our small school every opportunity to achieve their personal and educational goals, while providing a safe and welcoming learning environment.

We value parents as partners during this journey and invite you to visit the school, call your child’s teacher or principal, attend Board meetings and athletic activities and in general be a part of our community.
So, if you are new welcome and if you are returning welcome back! This is truly a great school and we all feel fortunate to be a part of it.
